scripts.build-css: cat media/css/poole.css media/css/syntax.css media/css/lanyon.css media/css/loose-bits.css | cleancss -o media/css/site.min.css
scripts.check-dirty: if [[ -n $(git status --porcelain) ]]; then echo "Found uncommitted files"; exit 1; fi
scripts.test: npm run-script build && npm run-script check-dirty
